POKS: Vandalski čin skrnavljenja spomen obeležja žrtvama komunista u Lisičjem potoku

02 Nov 2019, 11:15

Pokret obnove Kraljevine Srbije (POKS) osudio je danas, kako se navodi, "vandalski čin skrnavljenja" spomen obeležja u Lisičjem potoku u Beogradu, posvećenom gradjanima koje su komunisti streljali 1944. godine.Navodeći da počinioci "tog gnusnog čina nisu nepoznati, jer su se potpisali, iscrtavanjem srpa i čekića i crvene zvezde petokrake", iz POKS su pozvali nadležne da sprovedu istragu i "najoštrije" kazne odgovorne, ocenjujući da "takvi akti prete da se otvore stare rane i nastavi neki vid gradjanskog rata koji u glavama pojedinaca očigledno nije završen"."Vandalskim činom čupanja krsta koje je bilo obeležje mesta gde su pobijeni nevini ljudi, žrtve su ponovo ubijene. Ovo je potvrda da smo daleko od nacionalnog pomirenja suprotstavljenih strana u bivšem gradjanskom ratu, a ono nam je danas potrebnije nego ikada. Istina nas jedino može pomiriti a dok se ona sakriva, naše društvo će biti podeljeno i sukobljeno", naveo je potpredsednik POKS Vojislav Mihailović a prenela ta stranka.

POKS: Vandal act of desecrating commemoration of the victims of communists in Lisici creek

02 Nov 2019, 11:15

The Revolutionary Movement of the Kingdom of Serbia (POKS) has condemned today the "vandalic act of desecration" of a memorial in Lisic creek in Belgrade, dedicated to the townspeople killed by communists in 1944. Stating that the perpetrators of the "heinous act are not unknown, because signed by scratching the sickle and a hammer and a five-pointed red star, "the POKS called on those responsible to carry out the investigation and the" harshest "punishments of those responsible, assessing that" such acts threaten to open old wounds and continue some form of civil war that apparently appears in the minds of individuals. "The vandal act of snatching a cross, which was the hallmark of where innocent people were killed, the victims were killed again. This is a confirmation that we are far from the national reconciliation of opposing parties in the former civil war, and we need it more today than ever. The truth can only reconcile us, and while it is hidden, our society will be divided and conflicted, "said POKS Vice President Vojislav Mihailovic. transferred by this party.
